title: Mercor
description: An AI talent marketplace that connects specialized experts with AI labs and enterprises to advance AI development. Building here for the past 6 months.

title: Funnel
description: The unified interface for listing, deploying, and trading every asset across HyperCore & HyperEVM.

title: Showdown
description: Play, compete, and earn instantly on your favorite games, bringing the on-chain gaming revolution to Monad. Join tournaments and compete globally.

title: Prophet
description: A platform that gamifies options trading on Hyperliquid EVM, allowing users to win exponentially by predicting the correct price range of an asset.

title: Noon.AI
description: An AI platform for recruiting world-class talent, simplifying the process of finding perfect candidates for difficult roles.

title: Canto Ecosystem
description: Contributed to Free Public Infrastructure including Canto Pools (Liquidity), Canto Analytics, and the Liquidity Coordinator.
